animeDescription: A short ONA released on the MAGGardeninfo YouTube channel to promote the manga's 11th Volume. Immediately follows the events of the TV show, previewing material from the manga's as-of-yet unadapted 10th Volume with new original animation and voice acting.
animeRelated: ['Adaptation: Mahoutsukai no Yome', 'Parent story: Mahoutsukai no Yome']
